ProjectTitle: Advanced Infrared Interferometry Techniques for Exoplanets Characterization (AIITEC)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/03/2024
Data: are there any restrictions or 3rd party agreements to use data of the ESO archive?
Preservation/Sharing: you now mention using KU Leuven RDR for preservation but JMMC OIDB for sharing, note that you can only preserve data in RDR that you also intent to share via RDR, is all your data deposited in JMMC OIDB and is preservation guaranteed there for 10 years? Then you can use this database for preservation; otherwise please consult the storage guide for other long term storage solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
